page.title: 02A child's view of Clapham
page.content: Clapham is very small and there are only about 3OOO people there. It is mostly quiet but in the morning it is noisy. I appreciate the way that Clapham is tidy. I think that the shops in Clapham sell the most wonderful things. In Clapham there are four garages in all different directions and most of them have low prices for the petrol and oil. In Clapham it is almost exciting because of its parks. There is a river called the River Ouse, but it is easy to cross at the ford. People fish and swim and row there. It must be good. It is nice in Clapham because the people are friendly. I like living there.
